column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We have not changed our portions since our grand opening in March 2015. In fact
column2: as a franchise concept we have very strict recipes and measurements that we must follow in order for all of our menu items to look and taste according to corporate standards. Most importantly
column3: our ramen chefs use a specifc 2-1/2 cup ladle to distribute our broths into our ceramic ramen bowls -- nothing gets "eyeballed."
